attributes.action: GAMBLING KILLING SO MANY ....LADBROKE ,CORAL,PADDY POWER ETC
attributes.additional_details: Remove all BETTING machines from bookies shops
attributes.background:
GAMBLING IS ADDICTION.MORE AND MORE PEOPLE COMMIT SUICIDE OVER GAMBLING..
A huge increase in gambling addicts will make Britain's obsession with online betting a £2bn business. New evidence reveals that the number of people in danger of becoming problem gamblers has reached nearly a million
